markdownRemark.html:
Background

Some people said, “A year in the JavaScript world is equal to 10 years in the outside world.” It maybe a bit of exaggerated, but it shed some light on the learning hell of a frontend developer.

frontmatter.title: Understand the frontend tools
frontmatter.description: About the tools frontend developer used in 2019
